original_text: They were to rule over the day and night. They were to make the time of light separate from the time of dark.
korean_text: 낮과 밤을 주관하게 하시고 빛과 어둠을 나뉘게 하시니 하나님이 보시기에 좋았더라

sentences.original_text: They were to rule over the day
They were to make the time of light
separate from the time of dark
